description: Backcountry snow means backcountry cold. And once you step off the skin track – rest phases, transitions, descents – that cold hits hard. Light, packable, and warm, the Rush is ready for it. Windproof, water repellant, and highly breathable, the GORE-TEX INFINIUM™ outer utilizes our Hadron™ face fabric for maximum durability, minimal weight. 100gsm Coreloft™ insulates, an air permeable liner speeds vapour transfer, an insulated StormHood™ adds warmth, and an embedded RECCO® reflector can aid search and rescue.
name: Rush Insulated Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 20D 100% Nylon - bluesign Approved Material, Dope Dyed
